Class SignedWordElement

io.openems.edge.bridge.modbus.api.element.SignedWordElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModbusElement<Short>, ModbusRegisterElement<Short>
public class SignedWordElement extends AbstractWordElement<SignedWordElement,Short>
An SignedWordElement represents a Short value in an AbstractWordElement.
